title: Bulk create media accounts
fileUploadText: Upload a csv file containing a list of media accounts to be created.
recordDescription: Each record must include the email, first name and surname information.
headerDescription: The file must also have the header 'email,firstName,surname'.

fileUploadErrors.typeError: Please upload a valid file format
fileUploadErrors.sizeError: File too large, please upload file smaller than 2MB
